RE Committee Chair announcementdocRequest processed by itrezzoAgent Attachment of Committee Chair announcementdoc kb Status Converted Pages Words New York Avenue NW th Floor Washington DC fax wwwepsaorg MEMORANDUM TO EPSA Members FROM Lynne H Church President DATE November RE Committee Working Group Chairs Please join me in congratulating the following EPSA committee and working group chairs for Their tenure will take effect in January You will note that there will no longer be a Power Marketers Working Group That group was organized four years ago to assure that issues of interest to marketers were covered Since that time both our membership and the nature of the issues has changed Most of our Board and Associate level members now have marketing operations and issues concerning market development are in the forefront At this point having such a subgroup within the Regulatory Affairs Committee causes a lot of confusion For this reason the Executive Committee agreed with Julie Simons and my recommendation to disband the working group after At the same time we recommended establishing a vice chair since the purview of the committee is so broad COMMITTEE WORKING GROUP CHAIRS Environmental Issues Committee Michael Childers Vice President Mirant Corp Industry Operations Committee Jared Long President Constellation Operating Services International Issues Committee Yamin Afshar Senior Vice President Cogentrix Energy Inc Legislative Affairs Committee Scott Weiner Senior Vice President Sithe Energies Inc Accounting Working Group Kevin Polchow Tax Director AES Corp Tax Policy Working Group Shirley Myers Vice President TECO Energy Inc Political Action Committee Joseph Ronan Jr Vice President Calpine Corp Public Affairs Committee Mark Palmer Vice President Enron Corp Regulatory Affairs Committee ChairRobert Reilly Vice President Shell Trading Vice ChairTim Thuston Director Williams Energy Marketing and Trading Natural Gas Working Group John Orr Director Reliant Energy NERC Working Group Michael Gildea Manager Duke Energy North America Renewables Committee Andrew Chau Regulatory Counsel Director Tractebel North America State Issues Committee Douglas McFarlan Regional Vice President Midwest Generation Edison Mission Energy itrezzoAgent v running on WNAHOU processed this file in seconds For more information send a message with SubjectHELP to Itrezzo NRONcom You may also visit
